sections.heading: 5-301 through 5-311 of the Mental Health Law shall be known and may be cited as the "Mental Hospital Voluntary Admission Procedures Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1963, c. 81, ยง 1, emerg. eff. May 21, 1963. Amended by Laws 1986, c. 103, ยง 69, eff. Nov. 1, 1986. Renumbered from ยง 551 of this title by Laws 1986,
